Sure, here's a final connected part:

Despite the many sessions that Virgil and Roman had spent together in age regression, Virgil was still struggling with his anxiety and fears. He knew that he could always count on Roman to be there for him, but he couldn't shake the feeling of unease that had been building up inside him.

One day, as they were spending time together in their living room, Virgil started to feel a sense of panic rising up inside him. He tried to control it, but it quickly became too much for him to handle.

"Roman," Virgil whispered, his voice shaking with fear. "I...I need you."

Roman looked up at Virgil with a concerned expression, sensing the depth of his distress. Without hesitating, he took Virgil's hand and led him to their age regression space.

"Hey, little one," Roman said, using his gentle, calming voice. "What's going on?"

Virgil looked up at Roman with tear-filled eyes, feeling more vulnerable than ever before. "I'm...I'm scared," he said, his voice barely above a whisper.

Roman wrapped his arms around Virgil, holding him close and feeling his small body trembling against his chest. He knew that Virgil needed him to be his caregiver right now, more than ever before.

"Shh, it's okay," Roman said, rubbing soothing circles on Virgil's back. "You're safe with me. I'm here for you, always."

With those words, Virgil allowed himself to regress even further, slipping into a younger age than he had ever experienced before. Roman held him close, playing with him using toys and stuffed animals, and singing him gentle lullabies to help him fall asleep.

As Virgil slept peacefully in Roman's arms, Roman knew that he would always be there for him, no matter what. He would be his caregiver, his friend, and his protector, always ready to help him when he needed it most. And with that thought, Roman felt a sense of peace wash over him, knowing that he was making a real difference in Virgil's life.
